verses.roman:
keha yadi saṅga la-ite pāche uṭhi' dhāya
sabāre rākhibā, yena keha nāhi yāya

synonyms: keha—someone; yadi—if; saṅga la-ite—to take company; pāche—behind; uṭhi'-getting up; dhāya—runs; sabāre—everyone; rākhibā—please stop; yena—so that; keha—anyone; nāhi yāya—does not go.
translation: "If someone wants to follow Me, please stop him. I don't want anyone to go with Me.
